name: Space Bounce!
description:
Space Bounce! Is a flappy bird style game.

You play as a flying alien cat, flying through space, while dodging asteroids!

Press [SPACE] to fly up, but be careful! if you touch one of the (poorly made) Asteroid walls with convenient spaces in the middle, you'll crash and die! 

Try to beat your highscore!

This game probably wont be updated. Made for my first game jam, 1-Button Jam 2022

I KNOW I KNOW, The game is supposed to be one button only, and technically its two. But i wanted a menu, i didnt want to throw the player straight into the game. 

I am Floof, im a beginner game developer, i mainly use scratch. I intend to move to learning something like Unity, but scratch is easy, and i feel comfortable making my games there.

This game was made on scratch!

check the scratch page out here https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/764574829/ !
